author: wuli1986
info:
Inventory management for the organizationally-
challenged. Configure keys and other settings in the mod options.
 Press Sort key to sort inventory or open chest.
 Shift+right-click slot in inventory to lock it.
 Shift+Sort key reverses sort.
 Shift+Deposit-All key for Smart Deposit.
 Shift+Quickstack key for Reverse Stack.
